=There are three possible ways to create a task: =

==1.From the task list page==

To create a task from this page follow these steps:

1. Make double click on the Task Name column.

2. Enter the name of the task.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttCreateTaskName.png" align="left" />


3.Press enter. The task is created with default values. In the Etr(hrs) and %Complete columns the zero value is by default, in the  Start Date and Due Date todays date is by default, and in the Assegnee column the logged user is by default.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttCreateTaskNameEnter.png" align="left" />

==2.From the task chart page with the insert task above option==

To create a task from this page follow these steps:

1. Select the task you want to be under the new task.

2. Click on New button and select the Insert Task Above option.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttCreateTaskAbove.png" align="left" />

3. A Create New Task overlay shows up.

4. Enter all the data for the task.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttCreateTaskOverlay.png" align="left" />

5. Click on Add Assegnee link, and choose the assegnee for the task.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttCreateTaskOverlayAssegnee.png" align="left" />

6. Click on Save button. The task is added with all the information.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttCreateTaskView.png" align="left" />

If instead of creating a task, you want to create a milestone, click the check box. Automatically the due date and the estimate field are disabled.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttCreateMilestone.png" align="left" />
